name: Featured
description: Highlighted content selected for its quality or relevance.

name: Hot
description: Popular and trending content that has received recent attention.

name: Top
description: Highly rated or most viewed content over a period of time.

name: Fashion
description: Creative designs and styles of clothing and accessories.

name: Concept Art
description: Visual representation of ideas for use in films, video games, or other media.

name: Art
description: Creative works encompassing a variety of mediums and styles.

name: Architecture
description: Design and style of buildings and other physical structures.

name: Landscapes
description: Artistic depictions of natural scenery like mountains, valleys, and forests.

name: Logos, Icons & Design
description: Graphic designs used for branding and user interfaces.

name: Interior Design
description: Art and science of enhancing the interiors of spaces to achieve a more aesthetically pleasing environment.

name: 3D / Renders
description: Computer-generated imagery that creates three-dimensional objects and scenes.

name: Character Design
description: Creating and developing visual appearances for characters in media like games, animations, and comics.
